item.title: The Perfect Ending For The New ‘G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra’ Movie
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Sarah and I were talking about some of the movies that are coming out this summer, including G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra. Although G.I. Joe has a long history, my only memories were of the cartoon in the mid-80s. Then it hit me, I know the perfect ending for the new G.I. Joe movie! […]
item.content:encoded:
Sarah and I were talking about some of the movies that are coming out this summer, including G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra. Although G.I. Joe has a long history, my only memories were of the cartoon in the mid-80s. Then it hit me, I know the perfect ending for the new G.I. Joe movie!

If they’re smart they’ll leave this super special ending until after all of the credits have scrolled by:
